LanguageData.FremenMelee_Crysknife.label: crysknife
LanguageData.FremenMelee_Crysknife.description: A traditional fremen weapon designed from the tooth of a sandworm.
LanguageData.FremenMelee_Crysknife.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.FremenMelee_Crysknife.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.FremenMelee_Crysknife.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.FremenBullet_Carbine.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.FremenBullet_Rifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.FremenBullet_Weirding.label: sonic
LanguageData.FremenRifle.label: fremen bolt rifle
LanguageData.FremenRifle.description: Crude, rudimentary long rifle designed primarily for hunting, but often utilized in raids or defense.
LanguageData.FremenCarbine.label: fremen automatic carbine
LanguageData.FremenCarbine.description: A synthesis of off-world technology integrated with a shortened fremen long rifle. This weapon has been adapted purely for combat, with an automatic trigger. Fremen ingenuity has created a compact, accurate automatic carbine.
LanguageData.FedaykinWeirdingModule.label: fedaykin weirding module
LanguageData.FedaykinWeirdingModule.description: Originally introduced by off-world Great Houses, the weirding module is a device that amplifies and converts a users sound into an effective, highly lethal weapon.
